segments.text: Excuse me . Could you please take a picture of us with this camera ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Which button do I press to shoot ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to focus it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , this is a focus-free camera . All you have to do is point and press the button .
segments.speaker: S1
